Content.Text:
Master Amir. I cannot accept this! You
must tell me the truth!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can believe what I am telling you,
or not. That's up to you. I've nothing
more to say on the matter myself.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>...

Ah, what excellent timing! Hello there,
young lady. Can I talk to you for a
moment?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, leave her alone!

I've heard that there is a woman here in
town who is dating Master Amir.
<PAGE>
Is that the truth? Do you know anything
about this woman?
I've heard nothing
I am that woman

Yeah... I didn't think you would have
done. Sorry for asking such an odd
question!

Master Amir, I'll come and see you again
soon...

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Wait, listen!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
How did it come to this?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Anyway. <MYNAME>, I need to talk to you.
Please come to my room.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That man was from my homeland. He's been
sent to try and set me up in an arranged
marriage.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Marrying the daughter of a powerful
noble will increase my standing in line
for the throne. I'm not interested!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>But tell me, <MYNAME>. Why did you say
that to him back there? What kind of
reply was that?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I, for one, thought we were dating. But
maybe you think differently?
I was thinking of your position
I could ask you the same thing

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Position? My position? What of it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>My feelings for you are not trivial! If
I cared about position I wouldn't have
started dating you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm sorry. I understand that you said
that because you were thinking of me.
<PAGE>
The fault lies with me. I'll send a
letter home and let them know about us.
That should resolve the issue.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'm sorry for putting you
through this. Please, forgive me.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'm so happy that we
are together. There's no need to hide
that fact ever again.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I know, <MYNAME>. To make it up to you,
you can ask anything of me. Anything you
like!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You want to go on a date, now?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Of course, that's perfect. Let's go.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You're right. This is all happening
because I haven't told my father about
us being together.
<PAGE>
I shouldn't have been taking this out on
you, when the fault is mine. My
apologies...

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I'll send a letter home and let them
know about us. That should resolve the
issue.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'm sorry for putting you
through this. Can you forgive me?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I know, <MYNAME>. To make it up to you,
you can ask anything of me. Anything you
like!
W-What? You are the very woman!

He's claimed to be dating in the past
and it's just been a ruse, but this time
I see it is real! My apologies, Prince.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes. This time it is the truth. Do you
understand, now? I have to turn down
your offer.
Very well. I will let them know.

On gazing upon you closer, you're a
beautiful young lady. What's your name?

Lady <MYNAME>! I see. Please take care of
our esteemed prince.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll send a letter to let my father know
about this.
Very well. I shall take my leave.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That man was from my homeland. I've
known him since I was small.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>This is kind of hard to say, but... he
came to try and set me up in an arranged
marriage.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
As I've lied in the past about having
a girlfriend to avoid just such offers,
he didn't believe me this time either.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes, I'm sorry. This was all my fault.
I'm sorry to have put you through all
this.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
But <MYNAME>... I was very happy you just
came out and said that we are together.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah, no need to be shy about it now!
You looked so proud and defiant, it was
wonderful.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I know. To make it up to you, you can
ask anything of me. Anything you like!
